description: Try our easy to follow Peanut Butter Fruit Smoothie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Egg free,Spring,Sesame free,High fibre,High protein,Soy free,Dairy free
name: Peanut Butter Fruit Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup smooth peanut butter (smooth or crunchy)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the ingredients in a food processor or blender and process until smooth.
Pour into serving glasses and top with extra fruit if desired. Serve immediately. Note: Add extra milk to thin if necessary.
